53#include "libfdt_env.h"
54
55#include <fdt.h>
56#include <libfdt.h>
57
58#include "libfdt_internal.h"
59
60int fdt_address_cells(const void *fdt, int nodeoffset)
61{
62 const fdt32_t *ac;
63 int val;
64 int len;
65
66 ac = fdt_getprop(fdt, nodeoffset, "#address-cells", &len);
67 if (!ac)
68 return 2;
69
70 if (len != sizeof(*ac))
71 return -FDT_ERR_BADNCELLS;
72
73 val = fdt32_to_cpu(*ac);
74 if ((val <= 0) || (val > FDT_MAX_NCELLS))
75 return -FDT_ERR_BADNCELLS;
76
77 return val;
78}
79
80int fdt_size_cells(const void *fdt, int nodeoffset)
81{
82 const fdt32_t *sc;
83 int val;
84 int len;
85
86 sc = fdt_getprop(fdt, nodeoffset, "#size-cells", &len);
87 if (!sc)
88 return 2;
89
90 if (len != sizeof(*sc))
91 return -FDT_ERR_BADNCELLS;
92
93 val = fdt32_to_cpu(*sc);
94 if ((val < 0) || (val > FDT_MAX_NCELLS))
95 return -FDT_ERR_BADNCELLS;
96
97 return val;
98}
